reviewText: My old VHS copy of Silent night gave up the ghost. What to do? Went right to Amazon and there it was. A brand new wrapped copy was at my door in no time! Very pleased as this quaint little annimation has been part of our Christmas for decades.

Coverbox exactly as pictured. This is the story of the song Silent Night and how it was born. This animated tale takes you into a tiny, snow-covered village where the people learn valuable lessons and are reminded in a mystical way, the true meaning of Christmas. It is a holiday present for kids of all ages. Running time approximately 30 minutes.

I loved this show when I was a little girl. A story about a young man who writes a new song for chirstmas. I think this show gives a little history to a very beautful song. I feel it should be with the
rest of the Hoilday Classics.
